Reviews.Title: “Good deal for the money.”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights ago spartan clean accomodations nice flatscreen tv comfortable bed ac water lukewarm 95 able deal book advance rate included breakfast wasnt special eggs ham toast etc quick hotel close little india 15 minutes walk mustafa shopping mall sells 5 minute walk lavender mrt station id stay
